backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access-controlled user profiles and complex book project types including characters, worldbuilding, and prologue data with helpers for viewing and saving.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing application structure, pages, hooks, components, and styling.
frontend/DRAFT_BUILD.md: Draft build instructions and QA checklist for testing the multi‑character family questionnaire feature.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions configuring light and dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application orchestrating auth flow, workspace navigation, project selection, and opening the book setup questionnaire.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing app branding and optional workspace controls with hero image for unauthenticated views.
frontend/src/components/bookSetup/BookSe: A multi-step dialog for answering and saving book setup questions, including loading/saving previous answers and renaming the project.
frontend/src/components/bookSetup/bookSe: Defines the list of book setup questions and options for project, character, worldbuilding, and prologue categories.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Provides a form for creating or editing a character with fields for background, motivations, relationships, flaws, voice, and role.
Renders a read-only summary of a character grouped into background, motivations, relationships, flaws, voice, and story role.
frontend/src/components/characters/Creat: Wizard dialog for creating multiple band members, handling steps, validation, and submission to create characters in a project.
frontend/src/components/characters/Famil: Component that displays and navigates through a multi-step family questionnaire for a single person, managing answers and progress.
frontend/src/components/characters/famil: Defines structured questionnaire sections and questions with options used for the family character questionnaire.
Generates character background and trait text from questionnaire answers using deterministic formatting helpers.
Type definitions for questionnaire answers and per-person answer structures, including main-character and parent metadata.
frontend/src/components/characters/Multi: Dialog that manages multi-character setup and detailed questionnaire flow, including person management, main character selection, and final creation.
frontend/src/components/characters/multi: Defines types and constants for multi-character questionnaire roles, genders, and draft character structures.
frontend/src/components/ExportProjectBut: Button that exports the selected project to a downloadable Markdown file using exportProject().
Manages project creation, selection, renaming, deletion, and optionally opens a questionnaire after creating a project.
frontend/src/components/prologue/Prologu: Editor UI for creating and updating prologue fields, saving data via mutations, and managing local form state.
Displays a read‑only summary of prologue sections and draft content if available.
frontend/src/components/WorkspaceMenu.ts: Displays a workspace dropdown with genre and tool categories, supports adding/removing custom categories, and handles logout/navigation.
frontend/src/components/worldbuilding/Wo: Editor for a worldbuilding category allowing description updates and adding quick notes via mutations.
frontend/src/config/workspaceMenuItems.t: Defines the list of workspace sidebar menu items grouped into genres and tools.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor methods for projects, characters, and other project data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus light and dark theme CSS variables for the app’s color system.
frontend/src/lib/exportProject.ts: Generates a Markdown export of a book project including characters, worldbuilding, and prologue, then triggers a file download.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/sections/CharactersPage.tsx: Displays and manages character creation, editing, and questionnaires within the selected project.
frontend/src/sections/ProloguePage.tsx: Shows editor and outline tabs for creating and reviewing a project's prologue.
Renders editable worldbuilding categories using accordions tied to the selected project.
frontend/src/state/useProjects.ts: Manages loading, selecting, and persisting the active project using query hooks and localStorage.
frontend/src/state/useWorkspaceCategorie: Handles custom and built‑in workspace categories including persistence, creation, and lookup utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/src/views/HomeView.tsx: Landing view with branding and sign‑up/login actions for new or returning users.
frontend/src/views/LoginView.tsx: React view that renders a login screen using Internet Identity with error handling and a loading state.
frontend/src/views/SignUpView.tsx: React view that renders a signup screen using Internet Identity with error handling and a loading indicator.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project requirements and issues for converting a family questionnaire into a structured multiple-choice system with enforced parent-child relationships.
